text: for the new module syntax (<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-module-syntax-and-parameters>), can someone add documentation about repeater fields in the block syntax?

Thank you for the feedback John, I’m happy to say work is in progress to better tell the full story of modules, and this is one of the problems we’re working to address.

Right now the easiest way to show you, is our cms theme boilerplate’s pricing page.

<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/9b22512134f1ee57ef03f194461f66b5ce1dbecd/src/templates/pricing.html#L25-L35>

The features parameter is repeater text field.

<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/9b22512134f1ee57ef03f194461f66b5ce1dbecd/src/modules/Pricing%20card.module/fields.json#L29-L44>

The data structure you provide to the parameter is dependent on the type of field, see the default values for each field type in the module syntax and parameters page you linked above, to see what that should look like. Basic jist though is you are providing an array of that data.
thank you so much, that link will work for now!
